name: California Surfing
overview: California Surfing is an arcade cartoon theme surfing game set among the beaches of the California Coast. Multiple beaches and game modes keep the fun lasting longer and longer. Features: - Play with upto 4 players and judge the score of other wave riders. - 8 surfy characters, each with their own unique style and tricks. - Hit the Boost button for huge air time and wild tricks. - 8 beaches to discover and master, each with different breaks. - Earn points for good wave rides and winning contest modes. - Select from a colourful range of surfboards in the surf shop. - Upgrade riders' stats for better performance.
